Automatic Reconnect

A time will come when you somehow loose your internet connection or worse the server crashed. To avoid frustration of always having to restart the client, wait for the worlds to load and go thru the login procedure, we'll make the client detect these disconnects and automatically re-establish the connection.

Things to remember

  • Server IP
  • Username
  • Password
  • Character

Things to change

Change the networkhandlers to check which state we are in and instead of calling the normal functions, switch to the adapted function, which initializes certain data and keeps things like world and meshes loaded in the engine.

Things to clear

Entitymanger

Since we timed-out or lost connection for some time all entities are outdated. We can just clear all of them, cause we'll get them on connection anyways.

GUIManager

There are some windows which data will be outdated or simply be resend when we connect. So purge those windows of all data.

  • Inventory: We'll get this on connect, clear it.
  • Buddylist: Outdated data, clear it.
  • QuickBar: We'll get this on connect, clear it.
  • StatusWindow: We'll get this on connect, clear it.
  • HUDWindow: Outdated data, clear it.
  • ChatLog: Leave it alone, perhaps add a message to indicate disconnection.
  • Whispermessages: Leave it alone.
